text: @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse The lying hypocrite @realDonaldTrump aka Trumputin just tweeted 4hours ago that the COVID-19 deaths had decreased 39%.Pence says cases are increasing and that there’s help on the way.If Trumputin and the cowardly @GOP had cared they wouldn’t have called it a hoax. #TrumpResignNow
